sentences: Israel Romero Ospino or popularly known as "El Pollo Isra" (Born in Villanueva, La Guajira in 1954) is a Colombian vallenato musician, composer and accordionist.
1991 - De AméricaSinger Gabriel "El Gaby" García replaced Orozco
1999 - Más cerca de tíIn 1999 singer Jorge Celedon quits the group, replaced by Junior Santiago.
